nodes.text: This male Falleen was a soldier in service of Black Sun. As with the rest of Black Sun foot soldiers, he was stationed at the Black Sun fortress on Mustafar and guarded Xomit Grunseit and the Black Sun ruling council.

When the Captain of the Guard introduced Death Watch leader Pre Vizsla and the two Sith Lords Darth Maul and Savage Opress to Grunseit, Maul stated that he was forming an army and that he wished for Grunseit and his faction to join him. When Grunseit and the Black Sun ruling council refuse to join them. As a result of this, Opress killed him, along with all the other members of Black Sun in the room.
Later he and the rest of black sun soldiers they moved to Zanbar and later he and Black Sun foot soldiers with the Pyke syndicate ambushed members of the Mandalorian police force from shipping containers believed to be carrying goods but secretly smuggling the hostile gangsters.
This Black Sun infantryman was seen assaulting a mandalorian police captain, knocking him to the ground.
